title: Transaction Standards
summary: Transaction Standards: This section details the transaction standards that are supported by Ergo. More information can be found in the Ergo Improvement Proposals (EIPs) repository.

qa_pairs.question: What is the focus of the Transaction Standards section?
qa_pairs.answer: This section details the transaction standards that are supported by Ergo.

qa_pairs.question: Where can you find more information on the Ergo transaction standards?
qa_pairs.answer: You can find more information in the Ergo Improvement Proposals (EIPs) repository.

qa_pairs.question: What is the purpose of the Ergo Improvement Proposals (EIPs) repository?
qa_pairs.answer: The EIPs repository contains information on the transaction standards supported by Ergo.

qa_pairs.question: What type of technical details are covered in the Transaction Standards section?
qa_pairs.answer: The Transaction Standards section provides details on the transaction standards supported by Ergo.

qa_pairs.question: How can users learn about the practical applications of the Ergo transaction standards?
qa_pairs.answer: Users can find information on the practical applications of the Ergo transaction standards in the EIPs repository.

sections.heading: Transaction Standards
sections.content:
This section details the transaction standards that are supported by Ergo.

You can find more information in the [Ergo Improvement Proposals (EIPs) repository](https://github.com/ergoplatform/eips).
